pageContext.claim: “We're focused on [deporting] criminals. We're focused on -- if you look at MS-13 -- but when people come into our country, we take those people out and we take them out very legally.”
pageContext.analysis: Numerous news reports have shown the administration is targeting more than just deporting criminals. Many people who have lived in the United States for decades have been deported, even if they do not speak the language of the country they are being deported to.
